Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oCalculations in Eq-(2) should have used the probability p that a Tibet diffuse gamma-ray event is of unresolved-source origin, but the parameter p in Eq-(2) isthe probability that a gamma-ray event above 398 TeV from a
